mapper.select: SELECT v.v_no AS vNo, v.v_title AS vTitle, v.v_description AS vDescription, v.v_upload_date AS vUploadDate, v.v_views AS vViews, v.v_likes AS vLikes, v.v_hates AS vHates, v.v_instructor AS vInstructor, v.v_instructor_intro AS vInstructorIntro, v.v_category_name AS vCategoryName, v.video_id AS videoId, sv.saved_no AS savedNo, sv.saved_date AS savedDate FROM videos v JOIN saved_videos sv ON v.v_no = sv.v_no WHERE sv.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY sv.saved_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM saved_videos WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND v_no = #{videoNo}
